headline.main: TANKS STILL FIGHT; Enemy Has Lost 260 -- Some Axis Units Flee Main Battlefield

lead_paragraph: CAIRO, Egypt, June 2 -- A British counter-assault has shattered Field Marshal Erwin Rommel's main offensive in Libya, but German mechanized forces are making a strong stand on the dust-clouded battlefield twenty-eight miles southwest of Tobruk, front dispatches said tonight.

keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST FRONT
